subject: Physical Fitness
title: The Three Types of Muscle
description: A 60-second lesson on The Three Types of Muscle.

hook.text: Not all muscles obey your commands. Some work silently, without you ever knowing.

buildup.text: Skeletal muscle moves your bones â€” you control it voluntarily. It's what people mean by 'muscle.'

discovery.text: Cardiac muscle powers your heart. It beats 100,000 times a day and never takes a break.

twist.text: Smooth muscle lines your organs â€” stomach, blood vessels, lungs. You can't consciously control it.

climax.text: Only skeletal muscle responds to exercise training. Cardiac muscle adapts, but you can't 'flex' it.

punchline.text: You control one type. The other two run the show without asking.

quiz.question: Which muscle type do you voluntarily control?
